description: This header file declares exported API functions for a pointer array component in the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the pointer array object, providing an interface for external modules to interact with the pointer array component.

methods.name: AnscCreatePtrArrayComponent
methods.description: Creates a new pointer array component given container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayCOCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the pointer array object with specified context handles.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayCORemove
methods.description: Removes or deletes the pointer array object.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayCOEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary internal objects into the pointer array component.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayCOInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the pointer array object, setting up its internal state.
